summary: DT*: THE CONTACT STATED THE VEHICLE WAS HAVING A DECREASE IN BRAKING POWER AND THERE WAS A LOUD SQUEAKING, RUBBING NOISE WHEN APPLYING THE BRAKES.  THE BRAKES ON THE REAR WERE REPLACED.  TWO DAYS LATER THE REAR WHEELS LOCKED UP.  THE DEALERSHIP DETERMINED THE WHEEL SPEED SENSORS WERE BAD.  THERE IS AN NHTSA RECALL, # 05V379000 REGARDING THE SERVICE BRAKES, HYDRAULIC: ANTILOCK; HOWEVER THE VEHICLE IS NOT HAVING THE SAME PROBLEMS AS INDICATED IN THE RECALL; ALTHOUGH THE CONTACT FEELS THE TWO ARE RELATED.
